bug.author: JoPfeiff
bug.summary: Adapters with heads are stored multiple times after more than one checkpoint
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
when checkpointing at more than one steps, we seem to be storing the same adapter and head multiple times (in a loop) I think I was able to zero-in the problem:
adapter-transformers/src/transformers/adapter_model_mixin.py
Line 729 in a994914
custom_weights_loaders.append(PredictionHeadLoader(self, error_on_missing=False))
custom_weights_loaders.append(PredictionHeadLoader(self, error_on_missing=False)) When storing the model we append the prediction head, so this list increases every time we save the model. also here:
adapter-transformers/src/transformers/adapter_model_mixin.py
Line 767 in a994914
custom_weights_loaders.append(PredictionHeadLoader(self, error_on_missing=False))
<denchmark-h:h2>Information</denchmark-h>
Model I am using (Bert, XLNet ...): mBERT Language I am using the model on (English, Chinese ...): English Adapter setup I am using (if any): SST-2 in Glue script The problem arises when using:
[ x] the official example scripts: (give details below) my own modified scripts: (give details below)
The tasks I am working on is:
[x ] an official GLUE/SQUaD task: SST-2 my own task or dataset: (give details below)
<denchmark-h:h2>To reproduce</denchmark-h>
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
run GLUE on any task set --save_steps 2 --logging_steps 2
